enchantment.majospellenchantment.dayligh: Reduces cast time during daytime with clear overhead. Incompatible with Aria Noctis.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.dominio: Killing certain creatures has a chance to summon temporary undead to fight for you.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.excitat: Periodically, when your spells deal damage, they fire 6 additional magic missiles from the victimâ€™s location in all directions. Incompatible with Pax Sepulchri and Melodia Gelu et Flammae.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.gentle_: Applies Weakness effect on undead target after hurting or healing it with a HOLY spell. Incompatible with Excitatio Arcana and Melodia Gelu et Flammae
enchantment.majospellenchantment.hopeles: Increases spell power at low HP.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.ice_fir: Ice/Fire spells deal increased damage to burning/Freezing targets, but doing so also consumes the flames or reduces their freeze progress. Incompatible with Excitatio Arcana and Pax Sepulchri.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.mana_me: Restores durability when a certain amount of mana is consumed. Incompatible with vanilla Mending.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.mana_re: Restores mana on mob kill (scaled by target HP).
enchantment.majospellenchantment.necrovo: Releases Death Chain Lightning when killing mobs.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.nether_: Increases non-Ice spell level when in Nether or burning.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.nocturn: Reduces cast time at night or when overhead is blocked. Incompatible with Hymnus Aurorae.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.ocean_g: Reduces mana cost while in water or rain.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.party_l: Applies Glowing and "Sunday Fever!" effect on target sometimes after hurting it with a spell.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.phase_d: Grants Speed buff after hurting mob 3 times with spells in quick succession.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.power_i: Becomes a powerful melee weapon! This is POWER!
enchantment.majospellenchantment.red_lot: When this bow is also enchanted with Flame, arrows fired will create a small field of fire upon landing. Incompatible with Vlad Tepes.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.spell_s: Reduces all spell cooldowns on mob kill.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.vlad_te: Shooting arrows has a chance to additionally fire Blood Needles. Incompatible with Lotus Ignis.
enchantment.majospellenchantment.zoophon: Plays random animal sounds when casting spells.
